name: Old Town Racing Crew
description:
-----Game Synopsis-----

Travel has changed, cars have taken to the skies. Road traffic is nonexistent. Yet there remains a large number of enthusiasts, people still love older gas-powered cars. These antiques, these relics of a different time are collected by many, and the only thing left to do with them is race!

 -----Gameplay-----

Earn money by picking up money packs during the race. Bonus money is awarded for 1st and 2nd place finishes. If you get stuck or find a way to jump the track, then simply exit the race from the pause menu and restart the race. Sometimes the position system isn’t perfect, sorry about that.

The AI isn't very smart, they'll mostly just be obstacles in the game, they get stuck alot.

-----Controls-----

W or Up Arrow – Forward acceleration

S or Down Arrow – Brake and reverse

A or Left Arrow – Steer left

D or Right Arrow – Steer right

Tab – Pause menu

A steering wheel controller or gamepad may work. All the controls operate using horizontal and vertical inputs. You will need to use the mouse between races and for mouse movements. 

-----Gamedev series-----

You can watch the complete story of how I made this game here:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFez0-FXADy3tefElNBynXUFSAzLxYcmx
